mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_OPTION FROM T_PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY_CODE = #{ categoryCode } ORDER BY PRODUCT_OPTION

SELECT SELL_PRODUCT_ID , PRODUCT_CODE , DISCOUNT , IS_SELL , PRODUCT_CODE , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_STATUS , PRODUCT_AMOUNT , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_OPTION , PRODUCT_NATION , A.* , B.CATEGORY_CODE AS REF_CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME AS REF_CATEGORY_NAME , SELL_PAGE_NO , SELL_PAGE_TITLE , SELL_DETAIL_IMAGE_FILE_NAME , SELL_DETAIL_IMAGE_ORGIN_FILE_NAME , SELL_STATUS , FILE_PATH , CREATE_DATE , SELL_THUMB_IMAGE_FILE_NAME , SELL_THUMB_IMAGE_ORGIN_FILE_NAME FROM T_SELL_PRODUCT LEFT JOIN T_PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_CODE) LEFT JOIN T_CATEGORY A ON (T_PRODUCT.CATEGORY_CODE = A.CATEGORY_CODE) LEFT JOIN T_CATEGORY B ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE) LEFT JOIN T_SELL_ITEM_PAGE USING (SELL_PRODUCT_ID) LEFT JOIN T_SELL_PAGE USING (SELL_PAGE_NO) LEFT JOIN T_THUMB_IMAGE USING (SELL_PAGE_NO) WHERE 1=1
AND SELL_PAGE_NO = #{ pageNo }
